memberdef.argsstring: (SceneRPtr scene, castor::String const &name, FrameStyle *style, ControlRPtr parent, castor::Position const &position, castor::Size const &size, uint32_t headerHeight, ControlFlagType flags=0, bool visible=true)
memberdef.name: FrameCtrl

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor
scene
The parent scene (nullptr for global).
name
The control name.
style
The control style.
parent
The parent control, if any.
position
The position.
size
The size.
headerHeight
The header height.
flags
The configuration flags.
visible
Initial visibility status.
Creates the control's overlays and sub-controls
Destroys the control's overlays and sub-controls
Allows child classes to modify the position before it being set.
Allows child classes to modify the size before it being set.

Sets the position
value
The new value

Sets the size
value
The new value

Sets the background borders size.
value
The new value.

Tells if the control catches mouse events
A control catches mouse events when it is visible, enabled and when it explicitly catches it (enables by default, except for static controls. Setting both background and foreground invisible will also prevent mouse events catching.
false if the mouse events don't affect the control.

sets the visibility
Used for derived control specific behavious
visible
The new value

sets the caption.
caption
The new value
